name: Pikachu
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.

poke_power.name: Electro Recycle
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Pichu is anywhere under Pikachu, you may search your discard pile for a {L} Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can’t be used if Pikachu is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: BikaBika
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.
